config.timestamp.column.name: LASTMODIFIEDDATE
config.query: SELECT sx.PKPRODUCTNO as SKU_ID, i.INV_FKSTYLENO as STYLE_ID, i.FKSTORENO as STORE_ID, i.QOH, i.QOHSELLABLE, i.QOHNOTSELLABLE, i.QOO, i.QBO, i.QIT, i.LASTMODIFIEDDATE, i.INV_FKORGANIZATIONNO FROM VSTORE.SKUINVENTORY i LEFT JOIN (SELECT FKORGANIZATIONNO, FKSKU, PKPRODUCTNO FROM VSTORE.SKUXREF) sx ON i.FKSKU = sx.FKSKU AND i.INV_FKORGANIZATIONNO = sx.FKORGANIZATIONNO
